titleStmt.title: A proclamation, adjourning the meeting of Estates to the fifth day of June. Edinburgh, May 24. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of the Convention of Estates,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Extracted forth of the records of the meeting of the Estates, by me Ro. Mackenzie Cls.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: order of the Convention of Estates
